I quantified Noah's [_Crassostrea gigas_ (Pacific oyster)](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pacific_oyster) ctenidia RNA [from yesterday (20230712)](https://robertslab.github.io/sams-notebook/posts/2023/2023-07-12-RNA-Isolation-C.gigas-Ctenidia-from-Noah's-Heat-Mechanical-Stress-Project.html) using the Roberts Lab Qubit 3 and the RNA High Sensitivity (HS) Assay. 1uL of sample was used for each measurement./


---

#### RESULTS

[20230713-qubit-cgig-ctenidia-RNA](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1i3OHh1rPBvj9pVOXjeoRbnofW7pdg4iZJXfwkgi_4pg/edit?usp=sharing) (Google Sheet)

Yields were good. Will proceed with reverse transcription.
